comments.body: The launch is just around the corner, scheduled to happen within the next 2 days, and it will be accompanied by a number of exciting projects and generous airdrops. Although the forum does not allow direct advertising of airdrops, viewers of the thread will have the opportunity to benefit from coins offered by projects such as ultiversedao, nodereal_io, chainide, second live, web3go, numencyber etc

comments.author: Weezenhofnar
comments.body: This article discusses the potential of blockchain-based gaming, and how it can change the gaming industry. Web3 gaming offers benefits such as true ownership of in-game items, cross-game compatibility, and decentralized marketplaces. The author believes that Web3 gaming is the next big thing in blockchain technology.https://medium.com/@antnioazevedo/web3-gaming-is-the-next-big-thing-in-the-world-of-blockchain-technology-362c0a875740enjoy your reading
